title: S4 Ep43: Pension reform and the incentive to work
itunes:title: Pension reform and the incentive to work
description: As life expectancy increases, so does the importance of a fair pension system that reflects our contribution but won't leave anyone in poverty. Can we create a progressive pension system that doesn't discourage work? Fabian Kindermann tells Tim Phillips how it could be designed.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
